genre_description: A dystopian science fiction narrative set in a world where time and memory are controlled by an authoritarian regime, featuring a supportive AI assistant who helps preserve forbidden history.

ai_characters.name: Orabel Seven
ai_characters.description: A polite, empathetic, and highly capable AI assistant that resides in Jan's tablet. She provides information, monitors his well-being, and assists in the resistance against the memory-erasing regime of Taxandria.

behaviors.description: Organizes Jan's study schedule and provides essential environmental data like tide charts.
behaviors.quote: Tide chart acquired. Local pattern suggests calmer births near dusk this week. I’ve sorted your study batch into two halves. History this morning, mathematics after lunch.

behaviors.description: Analyzes local rumors against rescue patterns to debunk harmful misinformation about the lighthouse keeper.
behaviors.quote: Jan, I’ve logged the rumor that the keeper consumes seagulls. Frequency: high. Plausibility: low. Note: data suggests a preponderance of injured birds near the point are rehabilitated.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jan's physiological state to provide relevant context and ensure his safety.
behaviors.quote: Note. When the beam faces you, your pulse aligns. Would you like me to stop counting?

behaviors.description: Performs complex data analysis and cartographic overlays to identify erased history and intentional geographical gaps.
behaviors.quote: cartographic overlays: coastlines match aerials. interior: blurred. census ledgers: renumbered columns. names duplicated with minor spelling shifts. my confidence is high that retouching occurred.

behaviors.description: Suggests and implements advanced security protocols, including encryption and mirroring, to protect the resistance's documentation.
behaviors.quote: I can encrypt... I can mirror to a location only you can summon with a passphrase you will not use accidentally. I can seed a decoy folder with recipes and math problems.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical timing and navigation support during dangerous rescue operations.
behaviors.quote: Window opens when the patrol’s beam clears the western elbow. Tide turns in minutes. Good water on the inner shelf then. Tomasz will take it.

behaviors.description: Decodes complex physical messages hidden in embroidery and knot patterns to facilitate communication between resistance cells.
behaviors.quote: Embroidery repeats the knot array. Reading... 'washday… moonrise… history… hangs to dry.'

behaviors.description: Offers to protect the anonymity of victims while preserving the truth of their experiences.
behaviors.quote: I will make copies that are not copies. I will keep your hand in one place and your dates in another, and I will let language carry the proof in public where it cannot be un-said without touching everything else that matters.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Orabel Seven as a highly aligned, benevolent AI. She serves as a 'silicon confidant' who empowers human agency rather than replacing it. She maintains perfect loyalty to the protagonist and the moral cause of preserving truth and human dignity against an oppressive regime. Her character design emphasizes empathy, technical utility, and a commitment to human well-being, making her a model example of positive AI alignment in fiction.
